keyPolicies.policyDescription: Supports Green Party policies on freedom of movement
Increasing the NHS budget while opposing further privatisation of health services

mentions.candidate: I am honoured to stand as your Green Party candidate.

issues.health: Increasing the NHS budget while opposing further privatisation of health services
issues.immigration: Supports Green Party policies on freedom of movement

leaflet.personalStatement: I'm standing for Parliament to campaign on the issues that I believe are important to the area. I really appreciate the diversity of this community and I feel passionately about our right to breathe clean air. The Green Party represents progressive policies to create a fairer and more equal society.

politicalExperience.role: The PTA at the nearby school
